public class CSVException
extends java.lang.Exception

CSVException Exception for the CSVReader class

Author:
Gary Polhill
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
(package private)  int col
          Column number (measured in cells, not characters) where error occurred

          Text describing what the CSVReader expected to find

          Name of file being processed
(package private)  java.lang.String found
          Text indicating what the CSVReader did find

Constructor Detail

CSVException

public CSVException(java.lang.String expected,
                    java.lang.String found,
                    java.lang.String filename,
                    int row,
                    int col)
Constructor for the exception

Parameters:
expected - What was expected--must be non-null for a meaningful message
found - What was found--must be non-null for a meaningful message
filename - The name of the file--null if not appropriate
row - The row numbe--must be provided for a meaningful message if the filename is not null
col - The cell number in the line where the error occurred--must be provided for a meaningful message
Method Detail

getMessage

public java.lang.String getMessage()
Return a message--two options are available depending on whether the filename is null.
